title: PMS 2.0 747 - OVERREACTION MONDAY, NFL Week 3 Recap, Monday Night Football Preview, Joe Haden, Ian Rapoport, Run It HasselBECK With Matt Hasselbeck In The ThunderDome, & AJ Hawk
description: On today’s show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys overreact to everything that happened in a crazy week 3 of the NFL season including the Colts’ massive win over the Chiefs in their home opener, the Packers pulling out a close game against the Bucs in Tampa Bay, the crazy Bills/Dolphins game that solidified the Dolphins are for real, Lamar Jackson continuing his MVP type season, the snooze fest that was the Sunday Night game between the Broncos and 9ers, and everything else around the NFL. Joining the progrum to chat about what he’s been up to, his thoughts on the NFL so far this year, and what he’s going to do next career wise following his retirement from the NFL is 12 year NFL veteran at Cornerback, 3x Pro Bowler, All-Pro, Joe Haden (1:09:03-1:20:07). Later, NFL Network Insider Ian Rapoport joins the show quickly to chat about the biggest injury news from yesterday’s games and everything else we should be aware of as we head into Monday Night Football (1:57:36-2:04:09). Later, 17 year NFL veteran at Quarterback, 3x Pro Bowler, ESPN NFL analyst, member of the Seattle Seahawks Ring of Honor, Matt Hasselbeck joins the show LIVE from the ThunderDome for his weekly Run It HasselBECK segment where he highlights the best QB play of the week, and previews the Monday Night Football game (2:04:11-2:42:07). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow for Aaron Rodgers Tuesday, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
